<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_473</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_473</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Identificación de Cónicas</string>
            <string language="en">Identification of conic sections</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennzeichen der Kegelschnitte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Identification des sections coniques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Identificação de seções cónicas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Identificazione delle sezioni conic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσδιορισμός των κωνικών τμημάτων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones ejercicios para relacionar la fórmula y la gráfica de una cónica. Se estudian de esta forma parábolas, elipses, hiperbolas y circunferencias.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations with exercises where the student must identify which formula corresponds to which graph of a conic section. The unit uses this system to study parabolas, hyperbolas and circumferences.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cónicas</string>
            <string language="en">conic sections</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ecuación</string>
            <string language="en">equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">hipérbola</string>
            <string language="en">hyperbola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">parábola</string>
            <string language="en">parabola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">elipse</string>
            <string language="en">ellipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welches Simulationen 
mit Übungen verwendet, in denen der Kursteilnehmer kennzeichnen muß,
welche Formel entspricht, welchem Diagramm eines Kegelschnitts. 
Die Maßeinheit benutzt dieses System, um Parabeln, Hyperbeln 
und Umkreise zu studieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement ce qui utilise des 
simulations avec des exercices où l'étudiant doit identifier quelle 
formule correspond à quel graphique d'une section conique. 
L'unité emploie ce système pour étudier des paraboles, des 
hyperboles et des circonférences.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando qual usa simulações com 
exercícios onde o estudante deve identificar que fórmula corresponde
a que gráfico de uma seção cónica. A unidade usa este 
sistema estudar parábolas, hyperbolas e circunferências.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quale usa le simulazioni con 
le esercitazioni dove l'allievo deve identificare quale formula 
corrisponde a quale grafico di una sezione conic. L'unità usa 
questo sistema per studiare le parabole, i hyperbolas e le 
circonferenze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
με τις ασκήσεις όπου ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να προσδιορίσει ποιος 
τύπος αντιστοιχεί σε ποια γραφική παράσταση ενός κωνικού 
τμήματος. Η μονάδα χρησιμοποιεί αυτό το σύστημα στις 
παραβολές, hyperbolas και τα circumferences μελέτης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kegelschnitte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hyperbel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Parabel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ellipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sections coniques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hyperbole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">parabole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ellipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
